mapper.select: select * from postinfo order by pstNum asc
mapper.insert: insert into postInfo (pstTitle, pstContent, pstUser, pstTime, pstView) values(#{pstTitle}, #{pstContent}, #{pstUser}, #{pstTime}, #{pstView})
mapper.update: update postinfo set pstView = pstView+1 where pstNum=#{pstNum}
update postinfo set pstTitle = #{pstTitle}, pstContent = #{pstContent} where pstNum = #{pstNum}
